LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsMenuMobile.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enable the mobile app menu look.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.ItemBoxHoverEffect.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose between different hover effects for the product box.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsCategoryPageOneColumn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to make all catalog pages in One Column.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsQuickTabsOneColumn.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to make the quick tabs in One Column. This setting refers to the plugin Nop Quick Tabs.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsHeaderInsideHomePageMainSlider
LocaleResource.Value: Place Header Inside Home Page Main Slider

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsHeaderInsideHomePageMainSlider.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check to place the header inside the home page main slider. This setting works only if you use the Anywhere Sliders plugin inside the "home_page_main_slider" widget zone.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.HomepageCategoriesIds.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Choose the categories that you want to show on the home page as tabs.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.NumberOfHomepageCategoryProducts.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Set the number of products shown in each home page category.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.GoogleApiKey.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: This key is required to show the map. Read more in our documentation.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.EnableFooterMapOnHomePage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show the map in the footer only on the home page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.EnableFooterMapOnAllPages
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Map On All Other Pages

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.EnableFooterMapOnAllPages.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Show the map in the footer on all pages except the Home Page.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.CustomMapStyles.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Insert custom styles for the Google Maps in JSON format.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.NoResults
LocaleResource.Value: There are no categories to display.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultCategoryNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce category navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultManufacturerNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce manufacturer navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Admin.Settings.IsDefaultVendorNavigationEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: When checked the default nopCommerce vendor navigation will be displayed

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.HomePageCategories.NoProductsFound
LocaleResource.Value: There are no products found in this category

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Themes.Urban.Common.Newsletter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more
